error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'initial_deposit' (value: 1000) was used instead of 'first_year_interest_earned' (value: 200.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 1150
After one year he earns $200 in interest because 1000 x 0.2 = <<1000*0.2=200>>200
After one year it has $1,200 in the account because 1000 + 1000 = <<1000+1000=2000>>2000
He takes out $600 because 2000 / 2 = <<2000/2=1000>>1000
After this it has $600 in it because 2000 - 1000 = <<2000-1000=1000>>1000
She earns $90 in interest because 1000 x 0.15 = <<1000*0.15=150>>150
The account now has $1150 because 1000 + 150 = <<1000+150=1150>>1150
